libnetworkd::IOSocket

libnetworkd::IOSocket Class Reference

#include <IO.hpp>

Public Attributes

IOSocketState m_ioSocketState

Detailed Description

Basic virtual interface for everything that should be polled and notified in a SocketManager, usually during each main loop iteration.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void libnetworkd::IOSocket::pollRead (  )  [pure virtual]

This function is called if poll returned POLLIN and depending on the SocketState, this socket is currently in (set with IOManager::setStatus).

Implemented in libnetworkd::UdnsResolvingFacility, libnetworkd::TcpSocket, and libnetworkd::UdpSocket.

virtual void libnetworkd::IOSocket::pollWrite (  )  [pure virtual]

This function is called if poll returned POLLOUT and depending on the SocketState, this socket is currently in (set with IOManager::setStatus).

Implemented in libnetworkd::UdnsResolvingFacility, libnetworkd::TcpSocket, and libnetworkd::UdpSocket.

virtual void libnetworkd::IOSocket::pollError (  )  [pure virtual]

This function is called if poll returned POLLERR and depending on the SocketState, this socket is currently in (set with IOManager::setStatus).

Implemented in libnetworkd::UdnsResolvingFacility, libnetworkd::TcpSocket, and libnetworkd::UdpSocket.

Member Data Documentation

IOSocketState libnetworkd::IOSocket::m_ioSocketState

The state of this socket. This is really ugly to keep here from an OOP view but really pays out in performance.
